name: Virtual Damnation
description:
Fangame of the game five nights at freddy develop in 1 month and a half. Regular update.

The game contains 3 modes at the moment:
- Free roam : find objects in an abandoned building on 3 floors. An animatronic on each floor.

- Nights : survive 5 nights without dying. The environment changes every night.

- Special mode : survive as long as possible in a labyrinth and beat those records.

IT IS POSSIBLE TO CHANGE THE DIFFICULTY FROM NORMAL TO HARDCORE AT THE MAIN MENU OF THE GAME.

For any bug or other, please let me know at this email address: jeremie.jullemier@gmail.com
